title: White Horseshoe Balloon
summaries: The White Horseshoe Balloon is an accessory that grants immunity to fall damage, increases jump height by 33% and jump speed by 30%, and grants a double-jump. The height of the first jump is increased from 6 blocks to 10½ blocks (~75% increase), while the double-jump's height is increased from 8 blocks to 14½ blocks, reaching a total of 25 blocks with both jumps.
Jump height is oddly reduced when underwater, reducing your total underwater height from 19 blocks (8 + 11 from Blizzard jump) to 16 blocks (7 + 9 from Blizzard jump).

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the holder to double jump
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
statistics.Sell: 3
